scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run backend" "npm run frontend"
scripts.production: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false concurrently "npm run backend" "npm run frontend"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm run install-backend && npm run install-frontend && npm run build
